lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

Ms. Andre, your French teacher, who everyone in school claims is a "lezzie," has asked for your help cleaning up her office after school today. She asks you in front of a whole group of your friends, who begin to look at one another
and make faces. What will you do?
#TELL HER YOU ARE BUSY AFTER SCHOOL
#TELL HER YOU WILL HELP HER, THEN DON'T SHOW UP

Completely shaken up by the request, you tell her that you work in a local factory and have almost no time to yourself. You quickly excuse yourself. Your friends tease you anyway saying, "Why did she ask YOU in the first place?"

This only makes her ask you again and again. After the fifth time, she finally stops asking you. By now, she resents you for being so unreliable, which will probably bias her against you when she is giving out your grades.

This makes you the subject of unbearable teasing. In her office there is a picture of her husband and son, Jacques, who is a great-looking guy about your age. She explains that he goes to a private school. You comment on how handsome he
is. Ms. Andre smiles and offers to invite you over so that you can meet him. Oooh, la, la!
